channel.title: Weather at Philadelphia, Philadelphia International Airport, PA - via NOAA's National Weather Service

item.title: Overcast and 52 F at Philadelphia, Philadelphia International Airport, PA
item.description: Winds are East at 10.4 MPH (9 KT). The pressure is 1007.9 mb and the humidity is 83%. The wind chill is 48. Last Updated on May 4 2016, 8:54 am EDT.
